basics.name: Kenan SelimoviÄ‡
basics.label: Software engineer
basics.summary: I have fun building challenging systems. Focused on the outcomes, but always wary of taking shortcuts to get there. Self taught, IT Bachelors degree. Learned my craft in the world of startups, now focused on larger solutions, while keeping the startup spirit of pushing forward with accountability.

work.name: Tacta - The art of complexity Taming
work.description: Full stack developer working in both small and large teams
work.summary: A software company taming complex systems using the principles of extreme programming and DDD
highlights: Fell in love with TDD and Pair programming
Built a complex core of organisation management system
Built up a team still going strong after I left as a team lead
Familiarised myself with the DDD principles

work.name: Ministry of programming
work.description: Full stack developer working in small teams
work.summary: MOP is a startup factory, building startups from ground-up and investing money in them
highlights: Built a project from zero to production-deployed MVP in 12 workdays
Got a struggling project back on track
Familiarised myself with the Lean methodology

work.name: Meta Software solutions
work.description: Full stack developer working in small teams
work.summary: MSS is a small team of professionals doing everything needed for startups to succeed
highlights: Implement complex generic activity template for an activity booking project
Wrote code that was praised by the developers that came after me
Implemented challenging calendar scheduling logic

volunteer.summary: Held a lecture as a part of the 'Software or Hardware!? What about both?' event
highlights: Held a workshop - 'Connecting Flowthings to a Web application'
Teach a group of international students how to connect an IOT device to an AngularJs app

references.name: David Beck (Portiris team lead)
references.reference: Kenan is always in search to improve his skills and share his experience with the team. He has a great dedication for his work and will deliver clean and nice code

projects.name: Lazeo
projects.description: French beauty treatment provider. Worked as a full-stack dev in Spring boot and Angular, also using Event sourcing with EventStoreDB, CQRS and Testing library, among other tools.
highlights: Worked with implementation of event sourcing using EventStoreDB
Setup frontend testing using Angular testing library and Cypress
Lead a tightly integrated team

projects.name: Portiris
projects.description: Belgian social security provider for Brussels region. Worked as a full-stack dev in Spring boot and Angular, also using Event sourcing, CQRS, Axon, LDAP, RabbitMq, Cypress and Openshift, among other tools.
highlights: Worked with event sourcing and microservices
Did multiple technical team presentations and workshops
Setup Cypress tests

projects.name: Organitool
projects.description: Organisation management tool with focus on organisation mergers and reorganisations. Worked as a full-stack dev in Spring boot and Angular, also using NgRx, GoJs, Querydsl and AWS, among other tools.
highlights: Served as a team lead
Implement core of the system
Organise the team and setup best practices
Have procedures be followed long after I left the team
Setup automated testing

projects.name: Lilipass
projects.description: System for organisation of public events. Worked as a full-stack dev in NodeJs and React, also using Stripe, Docker, Bookshelf.js, Knex.js, JSDoc and Seats.io, among other tools.
highlights: Served as a team lead
Rewrite ad-hoc architecture into an architecture inspired by Spring Boot
Setup automated testing
Have CTO note that I got the project back on its feet and "they don't need to worry about it any more"
Setup Stripe connect

projects.name: MyTamarin
projects.description: Tool for finding a matching nanny. Worked as a full-stack dev in NodeJs and React, also using TypeORM, Docker and Redux, among other tools.
highlights: Go from zero to prod in 12 workdays as a single dev in team

projects.name: BeBoo - be booked
projects.description: Tool for offering schedulable services and appointment booking. Worked as a full-stack dev in NodeJs and React, also using Redux, Flow and AWS, among other tools.
highlights: Setup project and architecture
Implement complex scheduling logic
Implement generic activity template

projects.name: Freetouring.eu
projects.description: Schedule guided tours of Madrid. Worked as a full-stack dev in NodeJs, React and Sequelize, among other tools.
highlights: Setup architecture and lead frontend/backend team
Wrote code that'd get praised by people that would take it over
Rewrote Ruby backend into NodeJs
